segments.text: The kitchen layout shows the sink on the right with the window above it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows from the faucet, filling the basin to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands facing left, towel in hand over a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is calm, focused on the dishwashing task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forms on the floor from the overflow, wetting her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, open cabinets reveal the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy climbs on a two-step stool, reaching upward with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool appears unstable, legs splayed out unevenly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands nearby, arm extended toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden visible through window, with path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on counter near the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back on the window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a typical domestic setting with subtle activities.
segments.speaker: PAR
